abstract: HSBC is in advanced talks to buy the retail and commercial banking assets of Royal Bank of Scotland Group in China, India, and Malaysia, a person familiar with the matter told The Wall Street Journal.
snippet: HSBC is in advanced talks to buy the retail and commercial banking assets of Royal Bank of Scotland Group in China, India, and Malaysia, a person familiar with the matter told The Wall Street Journal.
lead_paragraph: HSBC is in advanced talks to buy the retail and commercial banking assets of Royal Bank of Scotland in China, India, and Malaysia, a person familiar with the matter told The Wall Street Journal.

headline.main: HSBC Said to Bid on RBOS Assets in Asia
